analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyi sku yang ma dor cig /
translated: Do not abandon the form body of the Buddha.

original: 'dod chags dang bral ba yang thob par gyis shig /
analyzed: 'dod chags dang bral ba yang thob par gyis shig /
translated: Attain freedom from attachment.

original: chos thams cad la chags pa med pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyang btsal bar gyis shig /
analyzed: chos thams cad la chags pa med pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyang btsal bar gyis shig /
translated: Seek omniscient wisdom that is free of attachment to all phenomena.

original: @351a *// chos thams cad la gzhan gyi dring 'jog pa med par sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su sbyang bar gyis shig /
analyzed: @351a *// chos thams cad la gzhan gyi dring 'jog pa med par sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su sbyang bar gyis shig /
translated: Purify the buddha realms without relying on others for all phenomena.

original: zhing gi mtshan nyid nam mkha' lta bur yang shes par gyis shig /
analyzed: zhing gi mtshan nyid nam mkha' lta bur yang shes par gyis shig /
translated: Know that the characteristics of realms are like space.

original: sems can yongs su smin par bya bas kyang ma skyo zhig /
analyzed: sems can yongs su smin par bya bas kyang ma skyo zhig /
translated: Do not be discouraged by the ripening of sentient beings.

original: bdag med pa'i mtshan nyid kyang ma spongs shig /
analyzed: bdag med pa'i mtshan nyid kyang ma spongs shig /
translated: Do not abandon the characteristics of selflessness!

original: mngon par shes pa'i ye shes la yang rnam par 'phrul bar gyis shig /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa'i ye shes la yang rnam par 'phrul bar gyis shig /
translated: Manifest the wisdom of the superknowledges!

original: chos kyi dbyings las kyang ma g-yo zhig /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings las kyang ma g-yo zhig /
translated: Do not move from the realm of phenomena!

original: byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa yang ma btang zhig /
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa yang ma btang zhig /
translated: Do not abandon the generation of the mind of awakening!

original: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la yang 'byung bar gyis shig /
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la yang 'byung bar gyis shig /
translated: Manifest the wisdom of omniscience!

original: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bas kyang sems can thams cad tshim par gyis shig /
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bas kyang sems can thams cad tshim par gyis shig /
translated: Satisfy all beings by turning the wheel of Dharma!

original: chos nyid brjod du med pa las kyang 'da' bar ma byed cig /
analyzed: chos nyid brjod du med pa las kyang 'da' bar ma byed cig /
translated: Do not transcend the inexpressible nature of phenomena!

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba dang / byin gyi rlabs kyang yongs su ston cig /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba dang / byin gyi rlabs kyang yongs su ston cig /
translated: Manifest the emanations and blessings of the thus-gone ones!

original: byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyang ma dor cig /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyang ma dor cig /
translated: Do not abandon the body of a bodhisattva!

original: yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po yang yongs su ston cig /
analyzed: yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po yang yongs su ston cig /
translated: Manifest great parinirvāṇa!

original: skye ba'i skye mched thams cad du yang snang bar gyis shig ces /
analyzed: skye ba'i skye mched thams cad du yang snang bar gyis shig ces /
translated: Manifest in all places of birth!”

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: “O son of noble family!

original: rnam pa de lta bu'i chos zung dang / snrel zhir bsgrub pa mngon par bsgrub pa rnams nye bar bsgrub pa 'di ni /
analyzed: rnam pa de lta bu'i chos zung dang / snrel zhir bsgrub pa mngon par bsgrub pa rnams nye bar bsgrub pa 'di ni /
translated: You should uphold the Dharma in this way.

original: sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las yang dag phul gyi chos bcu pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las yang dag phul gyi chos bcu pa'o //
translated: This accomplishment of the accomplishment of the practice of the Dharma in this way is the tenth quality of the Buddha’s activity.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: “O Son of the Victorious Ones!

original: bcu po de dag ni /
analyzed: bcu po de dag ni /
translated: These are the ten

original: byang chub sems @351b dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las te /
analyzed: byang chub sems @351b dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las te /
translated: activities of the buddhas of the bodhisattvas.

original: de dag la gnas shing /
analyzed: de dag la gnas shing /
translated: Abiding in them,

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams rang 'byung gi 'phrin las gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams rang 'byung gi 'phrin las gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go /
translated: the bodhisattvas attain the unsurpassed, self-arisen activity that is not dependent on others.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: “O Son of the Victorious Ones!

original: bcu po 'di dag ni /
analyzed: bcu po 'di dag ni /
translated: These are the ten

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nga rgyal gyi las te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nga rgyal gyi las te /
translated: activities of pride of the bodhisattvas.

original: bcu gang zhe na /
analyzed: bcu gang zhe na /
translated: What are the ten?

original: 'di ltar bla ma dang / sbyin pa'i gnas dang / pha dang / ma dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / yang dag par song ba dang / yang dag par zhugs pa la rim gro med pa ni nga rgyal gyi las so //
analyzed: 'di ltar bla ma dang / sbyin pa'i gnas dang / pha dang / ma dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / yang dag par song ba dang / yang dag par zhugs pa la rim gro med pa ni nga rgyal gyi las so //
translated: Not to respect one’s guru, one’s father, one’s mother, ascetics, brahmans, or those who are spiritually advanced or well behaved is an action of Mara.

original: chos smra ba dang / khyad par gyi chos khong du chud pa dang / chos rgya chen po ston pa dang / theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa dang / 'byung ba'i lam gyi tshul shes pa dang / gzungs dang / mdo sde la shin tu byang ba rnams la mi 'dud de khengs shing 'gying la /
analyzed: chos smra ba dang / khyad par gyi chos khong du chud pa dang / chos rgya chen po ston pa dang / theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa dang / 'byung ba'i lam gyi tshul shes pa dang / gzungs dang / mdo sde la shin tu byang ba rnams la mi 'dud de khengs shing 'gying la /
translated: Not to bow down to Dharma teachers, to those who have realized the special qualities, to those who teach the vast Dharma, to those who are established in the Great Vehicle, to those who know the way to liberation, to those who have the dhāraṇīs and are well trained in the sūtras, but to be arrogant, haughty, and proud instead;

original: chos dang chos smra ba la gus pa mi skyed pa dang / gus par mi nyan pa dang / zhe sa mi byed pa ni nga rgyal gyi las so //
analyzed: chos dang chos smra ba la gus pa mi skyed pa dang / gus par mi nyan pa dang / zhe sa mi byed pa ni nga rgyal gyi las so //
translated: not to generate respect for the Dharma and its teachers, not to listen with respect, and not to be deferential is an action of Mara.

original: chos mnyan pa dang / yang dag pa'i gtam bya bar 'jug pa las chos kyi shugs chen po skyes kyang chos smra ba la legs so zhes bya ba mi ster cing /
analyzed: chos mnyan pa dang / yang dag pa'i gtam bya bar 'jug pa las chos kyi shugs chen po skyes kyang chos smra ba la legs so zhes bya ba mi ster cing /
translated: Even when the power of the Dharma has arisen in him through listening to the Dharma and engaging in correct discourse, he does not give his approval to the speaker of the Dharma,🔽thinking, “Perhaps someone will have faith in him.”

original: la la zhig 'di la dad par 'gyur du 'ong ngo snyam pa ni nga rgyal gyi las so //
analyzed: la la zhig 'di la dad par 'gyur du 'ong ngo snyam pa ni nga rgyal gyi las so //
translated: This is the action of pride.

original: lhag pa'i nga rgyal bskyed de /
analyzed: lhag pa'i nga rgyal bskyed de /
translated: He generates a higher pride,

original: bdag gi gzengs bstod cing gzhan gyi nyams smod pa dang / rang gi drod mi 'dzin cing sems nges par rtogs pa mi skyed pa ni nga rgyal @352a *//
analyzed: bdag gi gzengs bstod cing gzhan gyi nyams smod pa dang / rang gi drod mi 'dzin cing sems nges par rtogs pa mi skyed pa ni nga rgyal @352a *//
translated: praising himself and disparaging others, not maintaining his own heat, and not generating a definite understanding.

original: gyi las so //
analyzed: gyi las so //
translated: This is the action of pride.

original: mtho ba'i nga rgyal bskyed de /
analyzed: mtho ba'i nga rgyal bskyed de /
translated: He generates a lofty pride,🔽concealing the praiseworthy qualities of those who are praiseworthy, speaking unpleasantly, and not being pleased by the praise of others’ good qualities.

original: shes bzhin khong du chud bzhin du bsngags par 'os pa'i gang zag rnams kyi legs pa 'chab pa dang / mi snyan par brjod cing gzhan gyi yon tan bsngags pas dga' bar mi 'gyur ba 'di ni nga rgyal gyi las so //
analyzed: shes bzhin khong du chud bzhin du bsngags par 'os pa'i gang zag rnams kyi legs pa 'chab pa dang / mi snyan par brjod cing gzhan gyi yon tan bsngags pas dga' bar mi 'gyur ba 'di ni nga rgyal gyi las so //
translated: This is the action of pride.

original: 'di ni chos so //
analyzed: 'di ni chos so //
translated: “This is the Dharma.

original: 'di ni 'dul ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni 'dul ba'o //
translated: This is the Vinaya.

original: 'di ni yang dag par sangs rgyas kyi bka' yin no zhes bya bar yang shes la /
analyzed: 'di ni yang dag par sangs rgyas kyi bka' yin no zhes bya bar yang shes la /
translated: One knows that this is the true word of the Buddha.

original: gang zag la zhe sdang zhing chos la zhe sdang ba dang / chos spong ba dang gzhan yang dpa' bas ldog par byed pa ni nga rgyal gyi las so //
analyzed: gang zag la zhe sdang zhing chos la zhe sdang ba dang / chos spong ba dang gzhan yang dpa' bas ldog par byed pa ni nga rgyal gyi las so //
translated: Hatred of persons, hatred of the Dharma, rejection of the Dharma, and also turning others away from it, are actions of pride.

original: stan mthon po 'dod cing gces par bya ba'i chos tshol ba dang / gzhan gyis rim gro bya bar sdod cing mngon par dga' ba dang / gnas brtan rgan pa tshangs pa'i spyod pa yun ring du spyod spyod pa rnams la mi ldang zhing mi bsu ba dang /
analyzed: stan mthon po 'dod cing gces par bya ba'i chos tshol ba dang / gzhan gyis rim gro bya bar sdod cing mngon par dga' ba dang / gnas brtan rgan pa tshangs pa'i spyod pa yun ring du spyod spyod pa rnams la mi ldang zhing mi bsu ba dang /
translated: Desire for high seats, seeking out things that are cherished, waiting for others to show respect and delighting in it, not rising up for elders who are advanced in virtue and have practiced pure conduct for a long time, not welcoming them,

original: bsnyen bkur mi byed pa ni nga rgyal gyi las so //
analyzed: bsnyen bkur mi byed pa ni nga rgyal gyi las so //
translated: and not honoring them, are actions of pride.

original: bzhin khro gnyer can du byas shing mi 'dzum pa dang / tshig 'jam zhing mnyen pa med la rtag tu khengs pa'i sems kyis klan ka tshol zhing glags lta ba ni nga rgyal gyi las so //
analyzed: bzhin khro gnyer can du byas shing mi 'dzum pa dang / tshig 'jam zhing mnyen pa med la rtag tu khengs pa'i sems kyis klan ka tshol zhing glags lta ba ni nga rgyal gyi las so //
translated: Having a frowning face, not smiling, not having soft and gentle speech, and always seeking to find fault with a hostile mind, are actions of pride.

original: lhag pa'i nga rgyal du lhung zhing mkhas pa'i drung du mi 'gro /
analyzed: lhag pa'i nga rgyal du lhung zhing mkhas pa'i drung du mi 'gro /
translated: They fall into excessive pride and do not go to the wise.

original: mi sten mi snyen /
analyzed: mi sten mi snyen /
translated: They do not attend on them, do not serve them,

original: rim gro mi byed cing /
analyzed: rim gro mi byed cing /
translated: and do not honor them.

original: dge ba ni gang /
analyzed: dge ba ni gang /
translated: They do not ask, ‘What is virtuous?

original: mi dge ba ni gang /
analyzed: mi dge ba ni gang /
translated: What is non-virtuous?

original: bya ba ni ci /
analyzed: bya ba ni ci /
translated: What should be done?

original: mi bya ba ni ci /
analyzed: mi bya ba ni ci /
translated: What should not be done?

original: ci zhig byas na yun ring por don dang / bde ba dang / phan par 'gyur zhes @352b mi 'dri /
analyzed: ci zhig byas na yun ring por don dang / bde ba dang / phan par 'gyur zhes @352b mi 'dri /
translated: What should I do to benefit myself for a long time, to be happy for a long time, and to be at ease for a long time?’

original: mi dpyod de /
analyzed: mi dpyod de /
translated: They do not investigate.

original: de rmongs pa las kyang ches rmongs par gyur nas /
analyzed: de rmongs pa las kyang ches rmongs par gyur nas /
translated: They are more confused than confused.

original: gti mug gis slong zhing nga rgyal gyis brgyal te /
analyzed: gti mug gis slong zhing nga rgyal gyis brgyal te /
translated: They are deluded by delusion and overcome by pride.

original: 'byung ba mi mthong ba ni nga rgyal gyi las so //🔽de mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis zil gyis non pas sangs rgyas skye ba mnyes par mi byed pa dang / sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba zad par byed cing /
analyzed: 'byung ba mi mthong ba ni nga rgyal gyi las so // de mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis zil gyis non pas sangs rgyas skye ba mnyes par mi byed pa dang / sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba zad par byed cing /
translated: Not seeing the truth is the activity of pride.

original: gsar du mi sgrub la /
analyzed: gsar du mi sgrub la /
translated: Since they are overcome by excessive pride, they do not please the buddhas who appear. They exhaust their previous roots of virtue and do not create new ones.🔽They explain what should not be explained.

original: mi bshad pa 'chad pa dang / 'thab mo byed cing rtsod pa mang bar gyur te /
analyzed: mi bshad pa 'chad pa dang / 'thab mo byed cing rtsod pa mang bar gyur te /
translated: They fight and argue a lot.

original: de de lta bu'i chos la mang du spyod pas 'dod rgyal chen por lhung ba'i gnas su gyur kyang /
analyzed: de de lta bu'i chos la mang du spyod pas 'dod rgyal chen por lhung ba'i gnas su gyur kyang /
translated: However, due to their extensive engagement in such Dharma, they fall into the state of great arbitrariness.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i stobs dang shugs kyis de da dung dbang phyug thob par 'gyur yang /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i stobs dang shugs kyis de da dung dbang phyug thob par 'gyur yang /
translated: Yet, through the power and strength of the bodhisattvas, they will still attain lordship.

original: bskal pa brgya stong du mar yang sangs rgyas skye ba mthong bar yang mi 'gyur na /
analyzed: bskal pa brgya stong du mar yang sangs rgyas skye ba mthong bar yang mi 'gyur na /
translated: However, for hundreds of thousands of eons they will not see the birth of a buddha,

original: chos mnyan pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te /
analyzed: chos mnyan pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te /
translated: let alone listen to the Dharma.

original: 'di ni nga rgyal gyi las bcu pa'o ////🔽bam po brgyad cu rtsa bzhi pa /
analyzed: 'di ni nga rgyal gyi las bcu pa'o //// bam po brgyad cu rtsa bzhi pa /
translated: This is the tenth activity of pride.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: “O Son of the Victorious Ones!

original: bcu po de dag ni /
analyzed: bcu po de dag ni /
translated: These are the ten

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nga rgyal gyi las te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nga rgyal gyi las te /
translated: activities of pride of the bodhisattvas.

original: de dag yongs su spangs shing /
analyzed: de dag yongs su spangs shing /
translated: Having completely abandoned them,

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams ye shes kyi las bcu 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams ye shes kyi las bcu 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go /
translated: the bodhisattvas will attain ten activities of wisdom.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: O Son of the Victorious Ones!

original: bcu po 'di dag ni /
analyzed: bcu po 'di dag ni /
translated: These are the ten

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi las te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi las te /
translated: activities of wisdom of the bodhisattvas.

original: bcu gang zhe na /
analyzed: bcu gang zhe na /
translated: What are the ten?

original: 'di ltar las kyi rnam par smin pa la yid ches pas /
analyzed: 'di ltar las kyi rnam par smin pa la yid ches pas /
translated: Thus, through confidence in the evolution of karma,

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu chud mi za ba ni ye shes kyi las so //
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu chud mi za ba ni ye shes kyi las so //
translated: the non-wastage of cause and effect is the work of wisdom.

original: byang chub sems mi gtong bas /
analyzed: byang chub sems mi gtong bas /
translated: Not abandoning the thought of enlightenment,

original: rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par @353a *//
analyzed: rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par @353a *//
translated: always and uninterruptedly

original: sangs rgyas yid la byed pa ni ye shes kyi las so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas yid la byed pa ni ye shes kyi las so //
translated: bringing to mind the Buddha is the work of wisdom.

original: dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsnyen cing bsten pa dang / rim gro byed cing de la ldang ba dang / bsnyen bkur ba dang / bla mar bya ba dang / nyan par dga' ba ni ye shes kyi las so //
analyzed: dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsnyen cing bsten pa dang / rim gro byed cing de la ldang ba dang / bsnyen bkur ba dang / bla mar bya ba dang / nyan par dga' ba ni ye shes kyi las so //
translated: Serving, attending, rising for, honoring, and listening with pleasure to spiritual friends is the work of wisdom.

original: chos la don du gnyer cing chos 'dod pa dang / chos tshol ba dang / thos pa btsal bas mi ngoms pa dang / tshul bzhin yid la bya bas sbyor ba dang / tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed pa yongs su spong ba ni ye shes kyi las so //
analyzed: chos la don du gnyer cing chos 'dod pa dang / chos tshol ba dang / thos pa btsal bas mi ngoms pa dang / tshul bzhin yid la bya bas sbyor ba dang / tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed pa yongs su spong ba ni ye shes kyi las so //
translated: Seeking the Dharma, desiring the Dharma, seeking the Dharma, not being satisfied with the search for learning, applying oneself to proper mental attention, and avoiding improper mental attention is the work of wisdom.

original: sems can rnams la nga rgyal med pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ston pa tsam du gces par sems pa dang / chos rnams la bdag tsam du gces par sems pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la srog tsam du gces par sems pa dang /
analyzed: sems can rnams la nga rgyal med pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ston pa tsam du gces par sems pa dang / chos rnams la bdag tsam du gces par sems pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la srog tsam du gces par sems pa dang /
translated: The activity of wisdom is to consider sentient beings as being without pride, to consider the bodhisattvas as being as dear as a teacher, to consider the teachings as being as dear as one’s own life, to consider the tathāgatas as being as dear as one’s own life,

original: nan tan nyams su blang ba la sangs rgyas tsam du gces par sems pa ni ye shes kyi las so //
analyzed: nan tan nyams su blang ba la sangs rgyas tsam du gces par sems pa ni ye shes kyi las so //
translated: and to consider the practice of earnest application as being as dear as one’s own buddhahood.

original: lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / 'tsho ba'i dbang po smad du mi rung ba dang / 'tsho ba mkhas pas bsngags pa dang / byang chub kyi las kyi rjes su rtsom pa'i rtsol ba ni ye shes kyi las so //
analyzed: lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / 'tsho ba'i dbang po smad du mi rung ba dang / 'tsho ba mkhas pas bsngags pa dang / byang chub kyi las kyi rjes su rtsom pa'i rtsol ba ni ye shes kyi las so //
translated: The activity of wisdom is to have physical, verbal, and mental actions that are irreproachable, to have a livelihood that is irreproachable, to have a livelihood that is praised by the wise, and to have the effort that is engaged in the activity of awakening.

original: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / mi 'gal pa dang / lta ba'i thibs po dang bral ba dang / gti mug gi mun pa dang / rab rib sel pa dang / ma rig pa'i mun nag med par byed pa dang / chos thams cad @353b la shes rab kyi snang ba rab tu thob par byed pa ni ye shes kyi las so //
analyzed: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / mi 'gal pa dang / lta ba'i thibs po dang bral ba dang / gti mug gi mun pa dang / rab rib sel pa dang / ma rig pa'i mun nag med par byed pa dang / chos thams cad @353b la shes rab kyi snang ba rab tu thob par byed pa ni ye shes kyi las so //
translated: The activity of pristine awareness is to cause the arising of things in dependence on conditions, to be free from contradiction, to be free from the thicket of views, to dispel the darkness of delusion and the cataracts of ignorance, to eliminate the darkness of ignorance, and to attain the light of pristine awareness with regard to all things.

original: yongs su bsngo ba bcu'i rjes su 'brang ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la mar 'du shes pa dang / thabs mkhas pa la phar 'du shes pa dang / bsam pa byang chub kyi rnam pa la zhugs pa ni ye shes kyi las so //
analyzed: yongs su bsngo ba bcu'i rjes su 'brang ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la mar 'du shes pa dang / thabs mkhas pa la phar 'du shes pa dang / bsam pa byang chub kyi rnam pa la zhugs pa ni ye shes kyi las so //
translated: The activity of pristine awareness is to follow the ten dedications, to perceive the perfections as one’s mother, to perceive skillful means as one’s father, and to be intent on the aspects of the enlightenment mind.

original: sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / thos pa dang / lhag mthong dang / zhi gnas yongs su tshol ba dang / bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su tshol bas mi skyo ba ni ye shes kyi las so //
analyzed: sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / thos pa dang / lhag mthong dang / zhi gnas yongs su tshol ba dang / bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su tshol bas mi skyo ba ni ye shes kyi las so //
translated: The activity of pristine awareness is to be indefatigable in seeking generosity, morality, learning, insight, and meditative concentration, and in seeking the stores of merit and pristine awareness.

original: las gang sangs rgyas kyis bsngags pa /
analyzed: las gang sangs rgyas kyis bsngags pa /
translated: Whatever actions are praised by the buddhas,

original: bdud kyi dkrugs ma dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad dang bral ba bsgribs pa dang / gcod pa dang / kun nas 'khor ba thams cad yongs su chad pa /
analyzed: bdud kyi dkrugs ma dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad dang bral ba bsgribs pa dang / gcod pa dang / kun nas 'khor ba thams cad yongs su chad pa /
translated: are free from the disturbances of Māra and all afflictions, are unobscured, are not cut off, and completely sever all cyclic existence,

original: sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / rnam par gdul pa'i ye shes dang mthun pa dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba la brtson pa /

analyzed: bsam gtan dang / bsam gtan gyi yan @356a *//

translated: Bodhisattvas go to the site of enlightenment in order to enter the great, non-abiding transcendence of wisdom,

original: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rnam par blta ba'i phyir /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rnam par blta ba'i phyir /
translated: in order to see all world systems,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yid la byed cing /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yid la byed cing /
translated: in order to bring to mind all the tathagatas,

original: phyogs thams cad du rnam par phye ba'i mngon par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: phyogs thams cad du rnam par phye ba'i mngon par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: in order to manifest the perfect enlightenment that is revealed in all directions,

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying po byang chub tu 'dong ba'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying po byang chub tu 'dong ba'o //
translated: and in order to go to the site of enlightenment of the bodhisattvas.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /🔽bcu po de dag ni /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras / bcu po de dag ni /
translated: “O jinaputras!

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying po byang chub tu 'gro ba sems can 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir yongs su bstan pa dag go ///
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying po byang chub tu 'gro ba sems can 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir yongs su bstan pa dag go ///
translated: These ten are the reasons why bodhisattvas go to the site of enlightenment in order to tame beings.🔽“O jinaputras!
